Uses of Interface
org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks.ColorCallback

  • Packages that use ColorCallback 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation
    Contains all classes to activate the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-annotation.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration
    Contains all elements to configure a chart instance (know as chart options at instance level).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.data
    Contains all elements to configure the datasets of a chart instance (know as chart data at instance level).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.datalabels
    Contains all classes to activate the DataLabelsPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-datalabels.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts
    Contains METER and GAUGE charts implementations (based on controllers), available out-of-the box.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.labels
    Contains all classes to use LabelsPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-labels.js) available for CHART.JS.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.sankey
    Contains all classes to activate the Sankey controller (AKA chartjs-chart-sankey.js ) for CHART.js.

    • Uses of ColorCallback in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation that return ColorCallback 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ColorCallback<AnnotationContext> AbstractAnnotation.getBorderColorCallback()
      Returns the callback called to set the color of the border of annotation.
      ColorCallback<AnnotationContext> LineLabel.getBorderColorCallback()
      Returns the callback called to set the color of the border of annotation.
      ColorCallback<AnnotationContext> LineLabel.getColorCallback()
      Returns the callback called to set the color of the text of label.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation with parameters of type ColorCallback 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AbstractAnnotation.setBorderColor​(ColorCallback<AnnotationContext> borderColorCallback)
      Sets the callback to set the color of the border of annotation.
      void LineLabel.setBorderColor​(ColorCallback<AnnotationContext> borderColorCallback)
      Sets the callback to set the color of the border of annotation.
      void LineLabel.setColor​(ColorCallback<AnnotationContext> colorCallback)
      Sets the callback to set the color of the text of label.

      Returns the background width callback, if set, otherwise null.

      Returns the border width callback, if set, otherwise null.

      Returns the color callback, if set, otherwise null.
      ColorCallback<ScaleContext> Grid.getTickColorCallback()
      Returns the tick color callback instance.
